claim: Josh Friedman wrote The Black Dahlia.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Josh Friedman  (  born 1967  )  is an American screenwriter best known as writer of the TV series Terminator : The Sarah Connor Chronicles and the 2005 film adaptation of H.G. Wells ' War of the Worlds .

claim: Josh Friedman wrote The Black Dahlia.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Friedman also publishes the blog `` I Find Your Lack of Faith Disturbing '' .

claim: Josh Friedman wrote The Black Dahlia.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After being offered an opportunity to work on a script titled Snakes on a Plane , Friedman posted a blog entry that sparked interest in the film on the Internet before the movie entered production .

claim: Josh Friedman wrote The Black Dahlia.

claim: Josh Friedman wrote The Black Dahlia.
